#summary File format support
#labels Featured,Phase-Design,Phase-Requirements

We need full support for most force spectroscopy data files. Please help us:
  * by giving us example data files
  * by giving us specifications of data files
  * by testing code and reporting bugs

= Supported file formats =

  * *Veeco Picoforce (6.x)*
    drivers: picoforce.py ; picoforcealt.py (depends on your version of Picoforce)


  * *JPK* (experimental support; needs testing!)
    drivers: jpk.py


  * Simple *comma-separated values*
    drivers: csv.py

= To do file formats =

  * Asylum MFP 1D
  * Anything else...
